title: 106_s1440
content: The Act titled "New Workers for Economic Growth Act" authorizes admissions of H-1B nonimmigrant workers. The Immigration and Nationality Act is amended to change annual limitations on nonimmigrant aliens admitted under certain categories. The Act exempts certain nonimmigrant aliens from these limitations. The Immigration and Nationality Act exempts certain nonimmigrant aliens from annual limitations based on their education level and employment status. The Immigration and Nationality Act exempts certain nonimmigrant aliens with a degree or higher (or equivalent) who are employed or have a job offer at an institution of higher education.
